name: Pulse Limited
description:
The anxieties of life in the 23rd century have lead to a dramatic increase in heart conditions. In response, the company Nebula Corp. has developed a most unusual technology; a surgical operation that allows for a patient's heart to be removed, and a dock installed in its place, allowing for mechanical hearts to be swapped in and out as easily as getting dressed! (And no less improper in public spaces.)

After recovering from the operation, a lone test subject awakes in the bowels of Nebula's flagship research vessel, only to find it twisted beyond recognition. With only the station's computer to guide them, they must find their way through this strange technological labyrinth, and uncover the secrets of what happened while they slumbered...

Design & code by John Gabriel
Pixel art by Jerico Landry
Concept/promotional art by Ruben Gardiner
Music & sound design by Isabella Lau
Voiced by Sarah Moss

Pulse Limited was made for the thirtieth Godot Wild Jam.
